self.name: auth.resendCode
self.description: Resend the login code via another medium, the phone code type is determined by the return value of the previous auth.sendCode/auth.resendCode: see login for more info.
self.descriptionExcerpt: Resend the login code via another medium, the phone code type is determined by the return value...

throws.description: The phone code you provided has expired, this may happen if it was sent to any chat on telegram (if the code is sent through a telegram chat (not the official account) to avoid it append or prepend to the code some chars)
throws.name: PHONE_CODE_EXPIRED
